Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2011 04:45PM IzzyK wrote: mwood, my lump is also on the outer side of my breast.  I got my mammogram and u/s scheduled for 1/25.  This facility doesn't do digital though, so I hope it's ok.  If I go to a different facility, it needs prior auth which they said would take 2 weeks- I don't want to wait.
Posts.Title: Found Lump IzzyK marie5890

Posts.Content: IzzyK wrote: So I've had this sort of dull ache in my left breast for years...told my OB in 2006, said it was nothing.  About a month ago I found a pea size lump under my right arm.  PCP said just a lymph node, probably nothing, but referred me for a baseline mammogram.  I'll be 37 next week.  Soonest I could get in was Feb 11.  After making the appt yesterday, I started feeling around where I've had that ache and was shocked to find a large lump.  I immediately called my OB/GYN and they saw me this morning.   She has ordered an expedited diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound of the lump.   She said the fact it was a little tender and felt a little mobile was good.  I have to call in a couple of hours to see if they'll get me in sooner.  Then she wants to see me a week after the tests.  So I'm trying not to freak out, but it's hard.  I've got 3 small children.
